name: The Wizards' Journey
description:
Each one of the wizards in this adventure masters their spell-casting field, but always struggled to defeat sorcerers with mixed abilities. This time they are trying a novel spell, which allows them to join forces to fight their opponents, could this be the missing piece the team was looking for?

Join them in this rhythmic journey, as they transform to, quite literally, combine the strengths of their fields of expertise.

Use UP and DOWN arrows to swap the character leading the formation and the SPACE bar to combine them into one. Defeat the enemies by fighting them with an equivalent source of magic.

The game was developed for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 under the theme "Stronger Together" in a week.
